name: Tower Defense Paradise!
description:
Game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #41 by Tyelor Klein (@Sokuaisushi) and Derek Sams (@DSCreate) as our first ever Game Jam!

The theme was to combine two incompatible genres , so we made a humorous mix between a tower defense and a visual novel for our entry!

You get a mix of humorous visual novel and strategy maze based tower defense, where your choices in the visual novel affect the strength of your towers.

Controls

 - Left click to advance visual novel
 - Left click to place tower (after selecting type)
 - Right click to cancel tower placement

"It's not a bug, it's a feature!"

We'd love to hear your comments and feedback! Please let us know what you think, and don't forget to rate our game at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$77712

Programming and art done by Tyelor Klein and Derek Sams.
